sentence.text: Herein, we report 3 patients with heterozygous constitutional phosphorylation of RNA polymerase II C-terminal domain mutations, who were ascertained through exome analysis of children with intellectual disability and positive regulation of glucose transmembrane transport anomalies, who lacked cardiac anomalies.

entity.text: phosphorylation of RNA polymerase II C-terminal domain
positive regulation of glucose transmembrane transport
